backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining surgery case types, user profiles, access control, and CRUD operations with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a redeploy-trigger marker file to components and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing frontend pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/deploy-retry.txt: Marker file whose content change forces a deployment retry.
frontend/scripts/generateProjectFilesMan: Node script scanning project directories to generate a JSON manifest of files excluding common build and cache folders.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring router, auth flow, themed layout, and inline login UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling login/logout with cleanup of caches and identity state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal component for initial user profile setup after login.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Form component for creating or editing a surgery case with validation, auto-fill, and status checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/cases/QuickAddDe: Provides quick demographic entry via text, manual edits, or OCR image capture, then applies parsed values.
frontend/src/components/cases/ToDoSectio: Renders a to-do list for a case with add, toggle, and delete actions backed by API mutations.
frontend/src/components/debug/DebugPanel: Debug interface showing identity, actor status, role, case stats, canister errors, and project files.
frontend/src/components/debug/ProjectFil: Displays and filters a manifest of project files with clipboard copy support and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with nav, footer, offline sync listener, and optional debug panel.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar showing app title, login control, offline status, and optional debug toggle.
frontend/src/components/offline/OfflineS: Displays online/offline status, pending offline operations, and controls for syncing or viewing queued changes.
Loads pending offline operations on mount to restore sync state.
frontend/src/components/offline/PendingC: Shows a dialog listing queued offline operations with actions to retry, remove, or clear them.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRoleDebug.ts: Fetches and polls the caller's backend role for debugging when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureUserRoleProv: Automatically provisions the user role after login with retries and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status using window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineSync.ts: Manages syncing queued offline operations with the backend actor, retrying operations and updating their status.
frontend/src/hooks/useProjectFilesManife: Loads and validates a static build manifest listing project files using a cached React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useProvisioningStatus: Tracks provisioning progress for the current principal, reporting state, retries, errors, and elapsed time.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, reading, creating, updating, and deleting cases with offline caching and queueing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/CaseDetailPage.tsx: Displays, edits, and deletes a single case with offline fallback and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/CaseListPage.tsx: Shows searchable, sortable case lists with offline awareness and import/export features.
frontend/src/pages/NewCasePage.tsx: UI page for creating a new surgery case, handling form submission, offline status, and navigation.
frontend/src/types/offlineOps.ts: Defines TypeScript types for queued offline operations such as creating, updating, and deleting cases and todos.
frontend/src/utils/caseMatching.ts: Provides a helper to find the most recent case for a given MRN by sorting matching cases.
frontend/src/utils/dateTime.ts: Utility functions for converting between Date, HTML date strings, and bigint nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsParser.ts: Parses free‑text demographics into structured fields, returning parsed data along with missing and uncertain fields.
frontend/src/utils/icStoppedCanisterErro: Detects IC stopped‑canister errors and returns explanations and suggested actions.
frontend/src/utils/logoutCleanup.ts: Attempts best‑effort cleanup of offline cache and queued operations during logout.
frontend/src/utils/ocrText.ts: Implements client‑side OCR using the browser’s TextDetector API with fallbacks and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/offlineDb.ts: IndexedDB utilities for caching case lists, individual cases, and queued operations offline.
frontend/src/utils/offlineQueue.ts: Manages offline operation queue storage, retrieval, updates, and cleanup in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/utils/safeErrorMessage.ts: Normalizes unknown error values into safe displayable strings.
Parses CSV rows into surgery case objects, including custom parsing for booleans, enums, quoted fields, and to‑do items. Provides helpers for normalizing headers and validating species/sex values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL hash. Supports both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, including schema version, issues, and existing features for deployment retry logic.
